title: Image formed by arrow near plane mirror

content.question: An object, slanted at an angle of 45Â°, is placed in front of a vertical plane mirror, as shown above. Which of the following shows the apparent position and orientation of the object's image?

choices.label: In choice A, the arrow points up and to the right.
In choice B, the arrow points down and to the left.
In choice C, the arrow points to the left.
In choice D, the arrow points up and to the left.
In choice E, the arrow points down and to the right.

content.answer: In choice D, the arrow points up and to the left.
